snippet: It might be hard for the Knicks to sustain the type of effective ball movement they displayed on Friday against the Heat, but it could benefit the team on both sides of the court this season.
lead_paragraph: It might be hard for the Knicks to sustain the type of effective ball movement they displayed on Friday against the Heat, but it could benefit the team on both sides of the court this season.

headline.seo: Knicks’ Passing Effective in Opener Against Heat
headline.main: Sharp Passing in Opener May Bode Well for the Knicks
headline.print_headline: Sharp Passing in Opener vs. Heat May Bode Well for the Knicks
